product.title: Windsor Petal Pink Curtain
product.description: This curtain has a sumptuous appeal with a silky soft-touch, cotton-blend fabric in a gorgeous dusky pink hue. The windsor petal pink curtain is detailed with an intricate wavy design that is textured with metallic yarn for added luxury. This fully lined curtain is will bring a touch of contemporary glamour to any room. relproducts.title: Amor Vibrant Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Valencia Orchid Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: If hot pink is too bright and baby pink too delicate, this valencia orchid pink roller blind is the perfect solution for you. The fabric is positively blushing, helping you to add a gentle and relaxing flash of colour to your home whilst filling your room with a feminine charm.

relproducts.title: Rimini Rose - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The pretty vintage of the rimini rose provides a strikingly elegant look, its dusky pink hue giving any room a warm, rosy glow. The long-lasting, resilient fabric has a smooth, effortless finish, allowing light to gently penetrate through. This blind is perfect for country chic designed rooms where it will be surrounded by cute florals and rich creams. Lovely in a bloom-filled bedroom, a light and airy hallway, or a rustic kitchen, this colour will go well with pale neutrals and country greens.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This stunning rosewood pink stockholm roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Lipstick Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholm fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft rosewood pink roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Hot Pink
relproducts.description: Stirlohot pink plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Rimini (Blackout) Primrose - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini (blackout) in primrose combines a best-in-class light-controlling blackout fabric with a rich, vivid yellow colouring; perfect for bringing the feel of sunshine in even when you need to block it out. This primrose colouring will brighten up any room. Consider the rimini in primrose as an addition to a white or pastel coloured landing or hallway, to add a splash of colour without the need to totally redecorate.

relproducts.title: Windsor Mist Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The windsor mist grey roman blind provides a sophisticated way to style your windows with the practical benefits of a sleek and compact folding design. Marrying a silky feel fabric in a gentle grey hue with a glittering flowing pattern, this modern motif is sure to sparkle. This warm grey blind is a versatile choice that will team well with a range colours such as beige, gold, navy blue or lime green.

relproducts.title: Windsor Petal Pink Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Sleek and minimalist with a touch of sparkle, the windsor petal pink roman blind is a glamorous option for light control within your home and will suit a range of settings. Reflective, metallic yarns pick out an alluring pattern upon a silky feel, soft pink backdrop that will give your space a subtle touch of decorative pattern. relproducts.title: Windsor Canvas Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Made from silky-feel, neutral toned fabric and beautifully enriched with strands of metallic yarn, this window blind will make a simple yet sophisticated update for your decor. The windsor canvas roman blind features a lustrous and sparkling finish that is given further richness by the visual effect of the smooth curving pattern. Product id: db-rom1073 fabric colour: canvas material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Windsor Raspberry - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In deep, pinky red, with the silky feel of deluxe satin, the windsor raspberry is a classic choice, adding plush homeliness and cosy luxury wherever it hangs. If ever there were a fabric made for the curves of the roman blind, this is the one. Try using the raspberry in a neutral cream or magnolia hallway to add a burst of colour to an often overlooked area of the home that can be much in need of a stylish lift.

relproducts.title: Windsor Taupe - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In soft, subtle mocha brown, the windsor taupe is an elegant and sophisticated blind, combining a silky and satiny sheen to complement its pretty colour. Gently raised ribbing provides this otherwise sleek fabric with depth and texture, adding a characterful feel to the blind. The taupe will work beautifully as a delicate neutral to temper bolder colours. Try it with a wine and cream colour scheme, opted for a boldly printed wallpaper and rich, dark floors.

relproducts.title: Windsor Red - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Vivid and vibrant, the windsor red simply refuses to be missed. Its bold colour suits the soft sheen of the silk-like fabric perfectly, and the cloth is a lightweight yet highly durable one, backed with polycotton sateen lining for long-lasting protection. The red is one for the glamorous, so do it justice by pairing with rich golds for a strikingly eye-catching look that will make your home one of contemporary class.

relproducts.title: Windsor Sandstone - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A gently shimmering pale gold, emphasised by the satin-feel fabric, the windsor sandstone is a blind of class and elegance. The silky cloth works wonderfully as a roman blind, easily falling into folds, and complementing the gentle curves. Craft a look of understated glamour in your living room by grouping the sandstone with cream walls and soft furnishings, wood-look tongue and groove flooring, and brushed gold oddments and accessories.

relproducts.title: Windsor Black - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: There's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind. Use the black in a contemporary setting, teaming it with a boldly patterned wallpaper in shimmering silvers. Pick a sumptuous purple or a luxe forest green to use as your accents, placing them throughout the room in the form of cushions, lamps, and ornaments.

relproducts.title: Windsor Ivory - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A sweet and sumptuous blind, mixing contrasting feelings of purity and grandeur, the windsor ivory incorporates pale, luxurious white and blends it with a silky smooth, lightweight fabric, all falling together into the gentle curves of the roman style. Keep your bedroom light and airy, with a touch of luxe, by hanging the ivory amongst pale pink or mint green walls, and accenting throughout the room with a darker version of your chosen colour.

relproducts.title: Windsor White - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.
